transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: K.C.F. father se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan bolie.
Executive: Ji sir, Simran baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan bolie. 
Executive: Mujhe Suraj sir ne number diya hai aapka. Actually mujhe sir ne kaha hai ki unhe apna template vagaira change karwana hai aur chije services ke regarding me discussion bhi kar lungi aapke sath, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap free hai sir abhi?
Customer: Free to hu abhi internet ka problem hai idhar internet nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kya nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Net nahi aa raha hai internet ka kuch problem hai fir bhi line pe rahega laptop on kar rahe hai.
Executive: Hmm. Mai aapko video meet pe connect kar lu?
Customer: Google me humko IndiaMART me jo hum logo ka jo website ka hai, IndiaMART me jo catalog bana rehta hai na wo catalog me kuch bhi sahi nahi hai to pehle Ajaad sir jo the wo handle kar rahe the, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To unko mai details unko bheja ki ye catalog thik nahi hai. Humko chahiye ki jaise product jo kuch tarika hota hai wo kya hota hai jo mix up karte hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isko kaha rakhna hai nahi. Samne jo hum login karenge to product koi dalega koi login karega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Samnamkin.in pe. To website hai usme kya hoga na?
Executive: Kya password?
Customer: Sir iska ki matlab jo hum log catalog hai, theek hai? IndiaMART me mano koi IndiaMART me koi vijaya jaake catalog show kiya to us catalog ka kuch matlab sahi tarika nahi hai. Jaise us catalog me www.samnamkin.in ka jo uska jo box hai ID hai us ID me hum dal ke dekhte hai usme matlab thik nahi hai catalog koi open karega to jo mix up ho gaya hai. Jaise ek ke baad ek.
Executive: Haan haan mai samajh gayi.
Customer: Wahi chij sir maine wahi to kaha aapse ki sir ne kaha hai template vagaira jo bhi kharab ho rakha hai to change karwa do mai. Pasand nahi aa raha tha template vagaira jo template sahi nahi hai product sahi nahi lag rahe hai aapko. Wahi change karwane ke liye call kara hai. Usi ke liye keh rahi hu sir aap free hai to mai video meet pe connect kar lu mai aapko baki templates dikha deti hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Fir aapko jo bhi change karna hoga mujhe bata dijiye mai karwa deti hu.
Customer: To isliye to humko aapko pehle humko jo details hum wo jo update kiya hai man lo ₹5 ke packet me usme wo dal de 250 250 gram ka ₹5 ka packet usme isliye hum usko category karke bhejna chahenge pehle uske baad hi ho payega.
Executive: Haan haan. Accha.
Customer: To ab mujhe bataye kaise karna hai fir. Matlab hai kya na sari chije thik bhi karwa dungi jo jo aap mujhe batate jaoge na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Mai wo chij ko thik bhi karwati jaungi yaha pe.
Customer: Thik hai. Aap mujhe batao aap free ho abhi mai schedule karu video meet pe?
Customer: Free to hu sir internet ka abhi problem hai idhar, thik hai na? Net nahi aa raha hai dekhte hai thoda line pe rahe mai aapko is number pe call back karu?
Executive: Ah mai aapko na aapke whatsapp pe message kar rahi hu, thik hai? Maine aapko waise na google meet ka link bheja hai, thik hai?
Customer: Mail me bheje hai to?
Executive: Haan ji mail par bheja hai, thik hai? Maine aapko na whatsapp number se message bhi kar diya hai. Mera naam Simran hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai aap apna ek baar wo. Haan aapka ye wala number whatsapp pe hai na waise?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan wo actually net vagaira bhi band aa raha tha na isliye.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay. Haan check kariye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change the template.

- Catalog is not correct.

- Products are mixed up in the catalog.

- Internet issue.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to show other templates.

- Executive offered to fix the catalog.

- Executive sent Google Meet link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the Google Meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, template, google meet, internet
